scripts.build:ui: rmdir build /s /q && cd ../Helsinki-fullstackExercise/part2/phonebook && npm run build && xcopy build ..\..\..\Helsinki-fullstackExercise-phonebook\build /s /e /y /i
scripts.deploy: git push heroku master && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:git: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
